      • mayReturnClosedConnection

        public boolean mayReturnClosedConnection()
        Description copied from interface: DataSourceProvider
        BoneCp has a bug which causes closed connections to be returned to the pool under certain conditions. (HIVE-11915)
        Specified by:
        mayReturnClosedConnection in interface DataSourceProvider
        Returns:
        true if the factory creates BoneCp pools which need "special attention"

        Specified by:
        supports in interface DataSourceProvider
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        factory able to create a connection pool for the implementation specified in the configuration
